sentences.en: After deductions for war reparations, the balance would be used to buy food and humanitarian supplies.
sentences.cn: 扣除战争赔款后，余下的钱将用于购买食品和人道主义物资。

sentences.en: Air bombardment raised criticism on the humanitarian grounds that innocent civilians might suffer.
sentences.cn: 空袭遭到了批评，因为从人道主义的立场来看，无辜的平民可能会受到伤害。

sentences.en: And on each of those issues we have said that we would consider that and, in fact, have provided some humanitarian support.
sentences.cn: 对于每一件这样的事情，我们都说过，我们将会对此进行考虑，事实上，我们向他们提供了人道主义援助。

sentences.en: But it thought that such a humanitarian proposal was one way of calming domestic dissent.
sentences.cn: 但它觉得这类人道主义的建议不失为平息国内不满意见的一种办法.

sentences.en: But otherwise, it is best left to the humanitarian experts, who will be there after you are gone and therefore need to preserve their independence and their impartiality.
sentences.cn: 但是，如果不能，最好将这些任务留给人道主义专家，这些专家在部队撤退之后仍将留在那，因此需要保持他们的独立和公正。

sentences.en: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.cn: 但是，对缅甸人民来说，正确的行动部分是为他们提供人道主义援助，而在目前这个时刻更是极端的需要”。

sentences.en: Even as a humanitarian mission it has been only a qualified success.
sentences.cn: 即便是作为一次人道主义行动，它也不过是取得了有限的成功。

sentences.en: He termed the war a humanitarian nightmare.
sentences.cn: 他称这场战争是一场人道主义噩梦。

sentences.en: He wants both sides, and their backers, to focus solely on this humanitarian issue for now.
sentences.cn: 他希望双方，和他们的支持者们现在只关注这一人道主义问题。

sentences.en: Hepburn is known as a great humanitarian.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道赫本是一位人道主义者。

sentences.en: Humanitarian aid is being sent to the refugees.
sentences.cn: 正向难民提供人道主义援助。

sentences.en: Humanitarian is the mixture of stupid, timid and overcautious and smart - aleck.
sentences.cn: 人道是愚蠢 、 怯懦和自作聪明的混合物.

sentences.en: I can appreciate his humanitarian zeal; it is the soundness of his thought that I question.
sentences.cn: 我能够理解他的人道主义热忱，我质疑的是他的观点是否正确。

sentences.en: I like to think of myself as a humanitarian.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢把自己看作人道主义者。

sentences.en: If Congo falls apart again, the humanitarian cost would be enormous.
sentences.cn: 如果刚果再次四分五裂, 那么为此付出的人道主义代价就太大了.

sentences.en: Mr Roh has also cut humanitarian assistance to ordinary North Koreans.
sentences.cn: 卢武玄还削减了对北朝鲜普通民众的人道主义援助.

sentences.en: She has many humanitarian interests and contributes a lot to them.
sentences.cn: 她拥有很多慈善事业,并作了很大的贡献.

sentences.en: The ceremony also honoredhonoured George Clooney for his humanitarian work, watching with.
sentences.cn: 艾美奖还因为乔治克鲁尼在人道主义方面的表现, 授予其奖项.

sentences.en: The well-known humanitarian, Joseph Rowntree, was concerned with the welfare of his employees.
sentences.cn: 著名的人道主义者约瑟夫.荣特里非常关心其雇员的福利。

sentences.en: to provide humanitarian aid to the war zone
sentences.cn: 给战区提供人道主义援助

sentences.en: Two of the trucks were stopped because they had tents in them, and under the commanders' definition of humanitarian aid, that didn't count.
sentences.cn: 两辆卡车被拦了下来，因为里面装有帐篷，按照指挥官对人道主义援助的定义，那不能算作援助物资。

trans.tran_cn: 人道主义的，博爱的，慈善的
trans.tran_en: concerned with improving bad living conditions and preventing unfair treatment of people
a person involved in or connected with improving people's lives and reducing suffering
